  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WEARING PROPER PPE AND USING DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL OF A DAMP PACKAGE OUTSIDE THE HAZ MAT AUDITORS OFFICE. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER OBSEVRVED A DAMP DIAMOND HAZARD PACKAGE, PROMPTLY AND SAFELY TRANSPORTED THE DAMP PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FUTHER INVESTIGATION AND PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024051537
item.description:
Report X-2024051537

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-20
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WEARING PROPER PPE AND USING DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL IN FRONT OF HAZMAT AUITORS OFFICE UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER OBSERVED ONE HAZARD LABELED PACKAGE THAT HAD A SMALL WET SPOT ON THE FLOOR THAT IT WAS SITTING ON. RESPONDER PROMPLY AND SAFELY CLEANED UP THE SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID AND TOOK THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER INVESTIGATION AND PROCESSING.

  • Description: WEARING PROPER PPE AND USING THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONCE SHEETS RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A CALL TO A WET PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD. UPON ARRIVING RESPONDER SAW A DOUBLE HAZARD LABEL BOX THAT WAS WET, SAFELY AND PROMPTLY CLEANED UP THE SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID AND TRANSPORTED THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FUTHER INVESTIGATION AND PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024051417
item.description:
Report X-2024051417

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-14
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE AUDIT; NO DAMAGE. RESPONDER CALLED TO HAZMAT AUDITOR HOLDING AREA FOR POSSIBLE UNDECLARED PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION FOUND A NITROUS OXIDE CYLINDER INSIDE A PLAIN UNMARKED PACKAGE. OUTER CARTON HAD ONLY FRAGILE HANDLE WITH CARE ON THE OUTSIDE WITH NO OTHER HAZARD WARNING LABELS AS TO THE INSIDE CONTENTS. PACKAGE HELD FOR INSPECTION. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1Z24390W0330702825, 1Z24390W0335061750, 1Z24390W0312565535, 1Z24390W0377862959, 1Z24390W0337399124, 1Z24390W0331421136, 1Z24390W0350164889, 1Z24390W0382321470, 1Z24390W0369131861, 1Z24390W0305974562, 1Z24390W0356560538, 1Z24390W0386766288, 1Z24390W0334530165, 1Z24390W0322314046, 1Z24390W0379762965, 1Z24390W0358677776, 1Z24390W0379314378, 1Z24390W0312294006, 1Z24390W0341631328, 1Z24390W0370278157, 1Z24390W0309663515, 1Z24390W0249740162

item.description:
Report X-2024050980

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-05T15:12:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-08
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2024050980-RESPONDED TO A LEAKING 5 PART PACKAGE, THE DRIVER BROUGHT BACK TO THE BUILDING. THE PACKAGE WAS 4-1 GALLON PLASTIC CONTAINERS OF ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL. THE PACKAGE WAS LABELED PROPERLY. ALL 3 CONTAINERS WERE PLACED IN GREEN DMP BAG. X-2024050981 -RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKING 5 PART PACKAGE, THE DRIVER BROUGHT BACK TO THE BUILDING. THE PACKAGE WAS 1 GALLON OF ISOPROPANOL ALCOHOL. THE PACKAGE WAS LABELED PROPERLY. THE CONTAINER WAS PLACED IN GREEN DMP BAG WITH SAME EACT PRODUCT FROM ANOTHER SHIPMENT.

item.title: Report E-2024050724
item.description:
Report E-2024050724

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-03T15:13:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XDE experienced a UN1992 Lacquer Thinner release from (2) 5-gallon metal pails. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 0.5-gallons of product released to a 1’ x 1’ area of the trailer floor due to an overtightened bung cap causing the gasket to warp, and release. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted area. The damaged pails and impacted absorbents were then collected into a 55-gallon metal drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024051411
item.description:
Report X-2024051411

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-03T15:13:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-17
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALEED TO HAZMAT AUDITOR HOLDING AREA FOR POSSIBLE UNDECLARED PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION DISCOVERED A NITROUS OXIDE CYLINDER WITH DOT LABEL 2.2,5.1 INSIDE A PLAIN UNMARKED PACKAGE WITH ONLY FRAGILE HANDLE WITH CARE ON THE OUTER CARTON OTHER THAN THE TRACKING LABEL. PACKAGE IS BEING HELD IN THE AUDITOR HOLDING AREA FOR REGULATORY INSPECTION. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1ZGA09690335516488, 1ZGA09690337436703, 1ZGA09690339222261, 1ZGA09690312563149, 1ZGA09690305083958, 1ZGA09690336146171, 1ZGA09690330934160, 1ZGA09690326306310, 1ZGA09690327414326, 1ZGA09690326389393, 1ZGA09690328828682, 1ZGA09690310181681, 1ZGA09690330249348, 1ZGA09690339269293, 1ZGA09690329320558, 1ZGA09690337110126, 1ZGA09690304171720, 1ZGA09690302424826, 1ZGA09690324056737, 1ZGA09690326652580, 1ZGA09690338098210, 1ZGA09690310069115, 1ZGA09690327132603, 1ZGA09690333928751, 1ZGA09690307976169, 1ZGA09690307978783, 1ZGA09690310258625, 1ZGA09690320360638, 1ZGA09690339542228, 1ZGA09690339298270, 1ZGA09690301755775, 1ZGA09690312010638, 1ZGA0969031006

  • Description: CALLED TO HAZMAT AUDITOR HOLDING AREA FOR POSSIBLE UNDECLARED PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION A PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN A FOOD GRADE NITROUS OXIDE CYLINDER FOR WHIP CREAM. THE OUTER CARTON HAD NO HAZARD INDICATIONS OR WARNINGS. PACKAGE IS BEING HELD FOR REGULATORY INSPECTION. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1Z2451R80363001518 AND 1Z2451R80328285485.
